divs: sighting detailsi went to let my dogs out around 8:35 pm and noticed 2 objects from a distance, traveling south and west toward my house. the first thing i noticed was 3 orange\red balls of light but multiply that by 2 since there was a pair, one closer than the other and moving slow. as they got closer and i really had a fantastic view i noticed that the 3 orange balls of light - formation like an upside triangle, were in an orb or bubble - almost like glinda from wizard of oz. i ran into my house to get my camera and when i returned, only one was in site and snapped a few pictures with my olympus 6.3-63 mm zoom and captured one good picture. when it was leaving it looked as though it followed the same path, but in reverse. when i viewed the pictures, i was surprised to see this fireball because vividly i can remember seeing 3 lights in an upside down triangle within a faded orb or bubble. i can tell you that i did not see anything resembling a plane, helicopter or wish lantern, just something incredibly, unusual.
Summary: Upside down triangle formation of 3 orange-red balls of light within an orb or bubble like sphere. Bright.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Warminster
There were no other sightings in Warminster on or around October 4th 2013
